original_text: She has wearied herself with toil; its abundant corrosion does not go out of it. Into the fire with its corrosion!
korean_text: 이 성읍이 수고하므로 스스로 피곤하나 많은 녹이 그 속에서 벗겨지지 아니하며 불에서도 없어지지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: She has wearied herself with toil
its abundant corrosion does not go out of it
Into the fire with its corrosion!
